name: Vulture Game Engine
preview: Vulture engine is a very lightweight game engine that I created with my collegues Isuru M. and Kaveen H
description:
Vulture engine is a very lightweight game engine that I created with my collegues Isuru M. and Kaveen H. It supports
  • Different types of lighting
  • PBR workflow
  • Texture loading
  • Model loading
  • Scripting
and so many more things.
Initially created with the intention of making a light weight engine and so far Vulkan and OpenGL APIs are supported by the engine with parallel-processing capabilities.
